ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ لِمَ تُحَرِّمُ مَآ أَحَلَّ ٱللَّهُ لَكَۖ تَبۡتَغِي مَرۡضَاتَ أَزۡوَٰجِكَۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nabiyu lima tuharrimu ma ahalla al-lahu laka tabtaghi mardata azwajika wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
ayah_english: O Prophet Why (do) you prohibit what has made lawful Allah for you seeking (to) please your wives And Allah (is) Oft-Forgiving Most Merciful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ لِمَ تُحَرِّمُ مَآ أَحَلَّ ٱللَّهُ لَكَۖ تَبۡتَغِي مَرۡضَاتَ أَزۡوَٰجِكَۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

ayah: قَدۡ فَرَضَ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمۡ تَحِلَّةَ أَيۡمَٰنِكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: qad farada al-lahu lakum tahillata aymanikum wal-lahu mawlakum wahuwa al-'alimu al-hakimu
ayah_english: Indeed has ordained Allah for you (the) dissolution (of) your oaths And Allah (is) your Protector and He (is) the All-Knower the All-Wise

ayah: وَإِذۡ أَسَرَّ ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِلَىٰ بَعۡضِ أَزۡوَٰجِهِۦ حَدِيثٗا فَلَمَّا نَبَّأَتۡ بِهِۦ وَأَظۡهَرَهُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِ عَرَّفَ بَعۡضَهُۥ وَأَعۡرَضَ عَنۢ بَعۡضٖۖ فَلَمَّا نَبَّأَهَا بِهِۦ قَالَتۡ مَنۡ أَنۢبَأَكَ هَٰذَاۖ قَالَ نَبَّأَنِيَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ
ayah_translit: wa-idh asarra al-nabiyu ila ba'di azwajihi hadithan falamma nabba-at bihi wa-azharahu al-lahu alayhi arrafa ba'dahu wa-a'rada an ba'din falamma nabba-aha bihi qalat man anba-aka hadha qala nabba-aniya al-'alimu al-khabiru
ayah_english: And when confided the Prophet to one (of) his wives a statement and when she informed about it and made it apparent Allah to him he made known a part of it and avoided [of] a part Then when he informed her about it she said Who informed you this He said Has informed me the All-Knower the All-Aware

ayah: وَإِذۡ أَسَرَّ ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِلَىٰ بَعۡضِ أَزۡوَٰجِهِۦ حَدِيثٗا فَلَمَّا نَبَّأَتۡ بِهِۦ وَأَظۡهَرَهُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِ عَرَّفَ بَعۡضَهُۥ وَأَعۡرَضَ عَنۢ بَعۡضٖۖ فَلَمَّا نَبَّأَهَا بِهِۦ قَالَتۡ مَنۡ أَنۢبَأَكَ هَٰذَاۖ قَالَ نَبَّأَنِيَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

ayah: وَإِذۡ أَسَرَّ ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِلَىٰ بَعۡضِ أَزۡوَٰجِهِۦ حَدِيثٗا فَلَمَّا نَبَّأَتۡ بِهِۦ وَأَظۡهَرَهُ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِ عَرَّفَ بَعۡضَهُۥ وَأَعۡرَضَ عَنۢ بَعۡضٖۖ فَلَمَّا نَبَّأَهَا بِهِۦ قَالَتۡ مَنۡ أَنۢبَأَكَ هَٰذَاۖ قَالَ نَبَّأَنِيَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

ayah: إِن تَتُوبَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ فَقَدۡ صَغَتۡ قُلُوبُكُمَاۖ وَإِن تَظَٰهَرَا عَلَيۡهِ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ مَوۡلَىٰهُ وَجِبۡرِيلُ وَصَٰلِحُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَۖ وَٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ ظَهِيرٌ
ayah_translit: in tatuba ila al-lahi faqad saghat qulubukuma wa-in tazahara alayhi fa-inna al-laha huwa mawlahu wajib'rilu wasalihu al-mu'minina wal-malaikatu ba'da dhalika zahirun
ayah_english: If you both turn to Allah so indeed (are) inclined your hearts; but if you backup each other against him then indeed Allah He (is) his Protector and Jibreel and (the) righteous believers and the Angels after that (are his) assistants

ayah: إِن تَتُوبَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ فَقَدۡ صَغَتۡ قُلُوبُكُمَاۖ وَإِن تَظَٰهَرَا عَلَيۡهِ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ مَوۡلَىٰهُ وَجِبۡرِيلُ وَصَٰلِحُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَۖ وَٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ ظَهِيرٌ

ayah: إِن تَتُوبَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ فَقَدۡ صَغَتۡ قُلُوبُكُمَاۖ وَإِن تَظَٰهَرَا عَلَيۡهِ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ مَوۡلَىٰهُ وَجِبۡرِيلُ وَصَٰلِحُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَۖ وَٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ بَعۡدَ ذَٰلِكَ ظَهِيرٌ

ayah: عَسَىٰ رَبُّهُۥٓ إِن طَلَّقَكُنَّ أَن يُبۡدِلَهُۥٓ أَزۡوَٰجًا خَيۡرٗا مِّنكُنَّ مُسۡلِمَٰتٖ مُّؤۡمِنَٰتٖ قَٰنِتَٰتٖ تَـٰٓئِبَٰتٍ عَٰبِدَٰتٖ سَـٰٓئِحَٰتٖ ثَيِّبَٰتٖ وَأَبۡكَارٗا
ayah_translit: asa rabbuhu in tallaqakunna an yub'dilahu azwajan khayran minkunna mus'limatin mu'minatin qanitatin taibatin abidatin saihatin thayyibatin wa-abkaran
ayah_english: Perhaps his Lord if he divorced you [that] He will substitute for him wives better than you submissive faithful obedient repentant who worship who fast previously married and virgins

ayah: عَسَىٰ رَبُّهُۥٓ إِن طَلَّقَكُنَّ أَن يُبۡدِلَهُۥٓ أَزۡوَٰجًا خَيۡرٗا مِّنكُنَّ مُسۡلِمَٰتٖ مُّؤۡمِنَٰتٖ قَٰنِتَٰتٖ تَـٰٓئِبَٰتٍ عَٰبِدَٰتٖ سَـٰٓئِحَٰتٖ ثَيِّبَٰتٖ وَأَبۡكَارٗا

ayah: عَسَىٰ رَبُّهُۥٓ إِن طَلَّقَكُنَّ أَن يُبۡدِلَهُۥٓ أَزۡوَٰجًا خَيۡرٗا مِّنكُنَّ مُسۡلِمَٰتٖ مُّؤۡمِنَٰتٖ قَٰنِتَٰتٖ تَـٰٓئِبَٰتٍ عَٰبِدَٰتٖ سَـٰٓئِحَٰتٖ ثَيِّبَٰتٖ وَأَبۡكَارٗا
ayah_translit: asa rabbuhu in tallaqakunna an yub'dilahu azwajan khayran minkunna mus'limatin mu'minatin qanitatin taibatin abidatin saihatin thayyibatin wa-abkaran

ayah_english: Perhaps his Lord if he divorced you [that] He will substitute for him wives better than you submissive faithful obedient repentant who worship who fast previously married and virgins

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ قُوٓاْ أَنفُسَكُمۡ وَأَهۡلِيكُمۡ نَارٗا وَقُودُهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱلۡحِجَارَةُ عَلَيۡهَا مَلَـٰٓئِكَةٌ غِلَاظٞ شِدَادٞ لَّا يَعۡصُونَ ٱللَّهَ مَآ أَمَرَهُمۡ وَيَفۡعَلُونَ مَا يُؤۡمَرُونَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu qu anfusakum wa-ahlikum naran waquduha al-nasu wal-hijaratu alayha malaikatun ghilazun shidadun la ya'suna al-laha ma amarahum wayaf 'aluna ma yu'maruna
ayah_english: O (you) who believe Protect yourselves and your families (from) a Fire whose fuel (is) people and stones over it (are) Angels stern severe not they disobey Allah (in) what He Commands them but they do what they are commanded

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ قُوٓاْ أَنفُسَكُمۡ وَأَهۡلِيكُمۡ نَارٗا وَقُودُهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱلۡحِجَارَةُ عَلَيۡهَا مَلَـٰٓئِكَةٌ غِلَاظٞ شِدَادٞ لَّا يَعۡصُونَ ٱللَّهَ مَآ أَمَرَهُمۡ وَيَفۡعَلُونَ مَا يُؤۡمَرُونَ

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ قُوٓاْ أَنفُسَكُمۡ وَأَهۡلِيكُمۡ نَارٗا وَقُودُهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَٱلۡحِجَارَةُ عَلَيۡهَا مَلَـٰٓئِكَةٌ غِلَاظٞ شِدَادٞ لَّا يَعۡصُونَ ٱللَّهَ مَآ أَمَرَهُمۡ وَيَفۡعَلُونَ مَا يُؤۡمَرُونَ

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَعۡتَذِرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina kafaru la ta'tadhiru al-yawma innama tuj'zawna ma kuntum ta'maluna
ayah_english: O (you) who disbelieve (Do) not make excuses today Only you will be recompensed (for) what you used (to) do

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَعۡتَذِرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوۡبَةٗ نَّصُوحًا عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمۡ أَن يُكَفِّرَ عَنكُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمۡ وَيُدۡخِلَكُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ يَوۡمَ لَا يُخۡزِي ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّبِيَّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥۖ نُورُهُمۡ يَسۡعَىٰ بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَبِأَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ أَتۡمِمۡ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَآۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu tubu ila al-lahi tawbatan nasuhan asa rabbukum an yukaffira ankum sayyiatikum wayud'khilakum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu yawma la yukh'zi al-lahu al-nabiya wa-alladhina amanu ma'ahu nuruhum yas'a bayna aydihim wabi-aymanihim yaquluna rabbana atmim lana nurana wa-igh'fir lana innaka ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: O (you) who believe believe Turn to Allah (in) repentance sincere Perhaps your Lord [that] will remove from you your misdeeds and admit you (into) Gardens flow from underneath it the rivers (on the) Day not will be disgraced (by) Allah the Prophet and those who believed with him Their light will run before their hands and on their right they will say Our Lord Perfect for us our light and grant forgiveness to us Indeed, You (are) over every thing All-Powerful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوۡبَةٗ نَّصُوحًا عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمۡ أَن يُكَفِّرَ عَنكُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمۡ وَيُدۡخِلَكُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ يَوۡمَ لَا يُخۡزِي ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّبِيَّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥۖ نُورُهُمۡ يَسۡعَىٰ بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَبِأَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ أَتۡمِمۡ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَآۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu tubu ila al-lahi tawbatan nasuhan asa rabbukum an yukaffira ankum sayyiatikum wayud'khilakum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu yawma la yukh'zi al-lahu al-nabiya wa-alladhina amanu ma'ahu nuruhum yas'a bayna aydihim wabi-aymanihim yaquluna rabbana atmim lana nurana wa-igh'fir lana innaka ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: O (you) who believe believe Turn to Allah (in) repentance sincere Perhaps your Lord [that] will remove from you your misdeeds and admit you (into) Gardens flow from underneath it the rivers (on the) Day not will be disgraced (by) Allah the Prophet and those who believed with him Their light will run before their hands and on their right they will say Our Lord Perfect for us our light and grant forgiveness to us Indeed, You (are) over every thing All-Powerful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوۡبَةٗ نَّصُوحًا عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمۡ أَن يُكَفِّرَ عَنكُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمۡ وَيُدۡخِلَكُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ يَوۡمَ لَا يُخۡزِي ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّبِيَّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥۖ نُورُهُمۡ يَسۡعَىٰ بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَبِأَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ أَتۡمِمۡ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَآۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu tubu ila al-lahi tawbatan nasuhan asa rabbukum an yukaffira ankum sayyiatikum wayud'khilakum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu yawma la yukh'zi al-lahu al-nabiya wa-alladhina amanu ma'ahu nuruhum yas'a bayna aydihim wabi-aymanihim yaquluna rabbana atmim lana nurana wa-igh'fir lana innaka ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: O (you) who believe believe Turn to Allah (in) repentance sincere Perhaps your Lord [that] will remove from you your misdeeds and admit you (into) Gardens flow from underneath it the rivers (on the) Day not will be disgraced (by) Allah the Prophet and those who believed with him Their light will run before their hands and on their right they will say Our Lord Perfect for us our light and grant forgiveness to us Indeed, You (are) over every thing All-Powerful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوۡبَةٗ نَّصُوحًا عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمۡ أَن يُكَفِّرَ عَنكُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمۡ وَيُدۡخِلَكُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ يَوۡمَ لَا يُخۡزِي ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّبِيَّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥۖ نُورُهُمۡ يَسۡعَىٰ بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَبِأَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ أَتۡمِمۡ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَآۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu tubu ila al-lahi tawbatan nasuhan asa rabbukum an yukaffira ankum sayyiatikum wayud'khilakum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu yawma la yukh'zi al-lahu al-nabiya wa-alladhina amanu ma'ahu nuruhum yas'a bayna aydihim wabi-aymanihim yaquluna rabbana atmim lana nurana wa-igh'fir lana innaka ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: O (you) who believe believe Turn to Allah (in) repentance sincere Perhaps your Lord [that] will remove from you your misdeeds and admit you (into) Gardens flow from underneath it the rivers (on the) Day not will be disgraced (by) Allah the Prophet and those who believed with him Their light will run before their hands and on their right they will say Our Lord Perfect for us our light and grant forgiveness to us Indeed, You (are) over every thing All-Powerful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوۡبَةٗ نَّصُوحًا عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمۡ أَن يُكَفِّرَ عَنكُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمۡ وَيُدۡخِلَكُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ يَوۡمَ لَا يُخۡزِي ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّبِيَّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥۖ نُورُهُمۡ يَسۡعَىٰ بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَبِأَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ أَتۡمِمۡ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَآۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu tubu ila al-lahi tawbatan nasuhan asa rabbukum an yukaffira ankum sayyiatikum wayud'khilakum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu yawma la yukh'zi al-lahu al-nabiya wa-alladhina amanu ma'ahu nuruhum yas'a bayna aydihim wabi-aymanihim yaquluna rabbana atmim lana nurana wa-igh'fir lana innaka ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: O (you) who believe believe Turn to Allah (in) repentance sincere Perhaps your Lord [that] will remove from you your misdeeds and admit you (into) Gardens flow from underneath it the rivers (on the) Day not will be disgraced (by) Allah the Prophet and those who believed with him Their light will run before their hands and on their right they will say Our Lord Perfect for us our light and grant forgiveness to us Indeed, You (are) over every thing All-Powerful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوۡبَةٗ نَّصُوحًا عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمۡ أَن يُكَفِّرَ عَنكُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمۡ وَيُدۡخِلَكُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ يَوۡمَ لَا يُخۡزِي ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّبِيَّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥۖ نُورُهُمۡ يَسۡعَىٰ بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَبِأَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ أَتۡمِمۡ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَآۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu tubu ila al-lahi tawbatan nasuhan asa rabbukum an yukaffira ankum sayyiatikum wayud'khilakum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu yawma la yukh'zi al-lahu al-nabiya wa-alladhina amanu ma'ahu nuruhum yas'a bayna aydihim wabi-aymanihim yaquluna rabbana atmim lana nurana wa-igh'fir lana innaka ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: O (you) who believe believe Turn to Allah (in) repentance sincere Perhaps your Lord [that] will remove from you your misdeeds and admit you (into) Gardens flow from underneath it the rivers (on the) Day not will be disgraced (by) Allah the Prophet and those who believed with him Their light will run before their hands and on their right they will say Our Lord Perfect for us our light and grant forgiveness to us Indeed, You (are) over every thing All-Powerful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوۡبَةٗ نَّصُوحًا عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمۡ أَن يُكَفِّرَ عَنكُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمۡ وَيُدۡخِلَكُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ يَوۡمَ لَا يُخۡزِي ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّبِيَّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥۖ نُورُهُمۡ يَسۡعَىٰ بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَبِأَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ أَتۡمِمۡ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَآۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha alladhina amanu tubu ila al-lahi tawbatan nasuhan asa rabbukum an yukaffira ankum sayyiatikum wayud'khilakum jannatin tajri min tahtiha al-anharu yawma la yukh'zi al-lahu al-nabiya wa-alladhina amanu ma'ahu nuruhum yas'a bayna aydihim wabi-aymanihim yaquluna rabbana atmim lana nurana wa-igh'fir lana innaka ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: O (you) who believe believe Turn to Allah (in) repentance sincere Perhaps your Lord [that] will remove from you your misdeeds and admit you (into) Gardens flow from underneath it the rivers (on the) Day not will be disgraced (by) Allah the Prophet and those who believed with him Their light will run before their hands and on their right they will say Our Lord Perfect for us our light and grant forgiveness to us Indeed, You (are) over every thing All-Powerful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ تُوبُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ تَوۡبَةٗ نَّصُوحًا عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمۡ أَن يُكَفِّرَ عَنكُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتِكُمۡ وَيُدۡخِلَكُمۡ جَنَّـٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ يَوۡمَ لَا يُخۡزِي ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّبِيَّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مَعَهُۥۖ نُورُهُمۡ يَسۡعَىٰ بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَبِأَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ أَتۡمِمۡ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَٱغۡفِرۡ لَنَآۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

ayah_english: O (you) who believe believe Turn to Allah (in) repentance sincere Perhaps your Lord [that] will remove from you your misdeeds and admit you (into) Gardens flow from underneath it the rivers (on the) Day not will be disgraced (by) Allah the Prophet and those who believed with him Their light will run before their hands and on their right they will say Our Lord Perfect for us our light and grant forgiveness to us Indeed, You (are) over every thing All-Powerful

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ جَٰهِدِ ٱلۡكُفَّارَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَٱغۡلُظۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nabiyu jahidi al-kufara wal-munafiqina wa-ugh'luz alayhim wamawahum jahannamu wabi'sa al-masiru
ayah_english: O Prophet Strive (against) the disbelievers and the hypocrites and be stern with them And their abode (is) Hell and wretched is the destination

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ جَٰهِدِ ٱلۡكُفَّارَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَٱغۡلُظۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۚ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

ayah: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱمۡرَأَتَ نُوحٖ وَٱمۡرَأَتَ لُوطٖۖ كَانَتَا تَحۡتَ عَبۡدَيۡنِ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا صَٰلِحَيۡنِ فَخَانَتَاهُمَا فَلَمۡ يُغۡنِيَا عَنۡهُمَا مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗا وَقِيلَ ٱدۡخُلَا ٱلنَّارَ مَعَ ٱلدَّـٰخِلِينَ
ayah_translit: daraba al-lahu mathalan lilladhina kafaru im'ra-ata nuhin wa-im'ra-ata lutin kanata tahta abdayni min ibadina salihayni fakhanatahuma falam yugh'niya anhuma mina al-lahi shayan waqila ud'khula al-nara ma'a al-dakhilina
ayah_english: Presents Allah an example for those who disbelieved (the) wife (of) Nuh (and the) wife (of) Lut They were under two [slaves] of Our slaves righteous but they both betrayed them so not they availed both of them from Allah (in) anything and it was said Enter the Fire with those who enter

ayah: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱمۡرَأَتَ نُوحٖ وَٱمۡرَأَتَ لُوطٖۖ كَانَتَا تَحۡتَ عَبۡدَيۡنِ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا صَٰلِحَيۡنِ فَخَانَتَاهُمَا فَلَمۡ يُغۡنِيَا عَنۡهُمَا مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗا وَقِيلَ ٱدۡخُلَا ٱلنَّارَ مَعَ ٱلدَّـٰخِلِينَ

ayah: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱمۡرَأَتَ نُوحٖ وَٱمۡرَأَتَ لُوطٖۖ كَانَتَا تَحۡتَ عَبۡدَيۡنِ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا صَٰلِحَيۡنِ فَخَانَتَاهُمَا فَلَمۡ يُغۡنِيَا عَنۡهُمَا مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗا وَقِيلَ ٱدۡخُلَا ٱلنَّارَ مَعَ ٱلدَّـٰخِلِينَ
ayah_translit: daraba al-lahu mathalan lilladhina kafaru im'ra-ata nuhin wa-im'ra-ata lutin kanata tahta abdayni min ibadina salihayni fakhanatahuma falam yugh'niya anhuma mina al-lahi shayan waqila ud'khula al-nara ma'a al-dakhilina
ayah_english: Presents Allah an example for those who disbelieved (the) wife (of) Nuh (and the) wife (of) Lut They were under two [slaves] of Our slaves righteous but they both betrayed them so not they availed both of them from Allah (in) anything and it was said Enter the Fire with those who enter

ayah: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ ٱمۡرَأَتَ نُوحٖ وَٱمۡرَأَتَ لُوطٖۖ كَانَتَا تَحۡتَ عَبۡدَيۡنِ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا صَٰلِحَيۡنِ فَخَانَتَاهُمَا فَلَمۡ يُغۡنِيَا عَنۡهُمَا مِنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيۡـٔٗا وَقِيلَ ٱدۡخُلَا ٱلنَّارَ مَعَ ٱلدَّـٰخِلِينَ

ayah: وَضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱمۡرَأَتَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِذۡ قَالَتۡ رَبِّ ٱبۡنِ لِي عِندَكَ بَيۡتٗا فِي ٱلۡجَنَّةِ وَنَجِّنِي مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَعَمَلِهِۦ وَنَجِّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
ayah_translit: wadaraba al-lahu mathalan lilladhina amanu im'ra-ata fir'awna idh qalat rabbi ib'ni li indaka baytan fi al-janati wanajjini min fir'awna wa'amalihi wanajjini mina al-qawmi al-zalimina
ayah_english: And presents Allah an example for those who believed (the) wife (of) Firaun when she said My Lord Build for me near You a house in Paradise and save me from Firaun and his deeds and save me from the people the wrongdoers

ayah: وَضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱمۡرَأَتَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِذۡ قَالَتۡ رَبِّ ٱبۡنِ لِي عِندَكَ بَيۡتٗا فِي ٱلۡجَنَّةِ وَنَجِّنِي مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَعَمَلِهِۦ وَنَجِّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

ayah: وَمَرۡيَمَ ٱبۡنَتَ عِمۡرَٰنَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَحۡصَنَتۡ فَرۡجَهَا فَنَفَخۡنَا فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِنَا وَصَدَّقَتۡ بِكَلِمَٰتِ رَبِّهَا وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَكَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِتِينَ
ayah_translit: wamaryama ib'nata im'rana allati ahsanat farjaha fanafakhna fihi min ruhina wasaddaqat bikalimati rabbiha wakutubihi wakanat mina al-qanitina
ayah_english: And Maryam (the) daughter (of) Imran who guarded her chastity so We breathed into it of Our Spirit And she believed (in the) Words (of) her Lord and His Books and she was of the devoutly obedient

ayah: وَمَرۡيَمَ ٱبۡنَتَ عِمۡرَٰنَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَحۡصَنَتۡ فَرۡجَهَا فَنَفَخۡنَا فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِنَا وَصَدَّقَتۡ بِكَلِمَٰتِ رَبِّهَا وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَكَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِتِينَ
ayah_translit: wamaryama ib'nata im'rana allati ahsanat farjaha fanafakhna fihi min ruhina wasaddaqat bikalimati rabbiha wakutubihi wakanat mina al-qanitina
ayah_english: And Maryam (the) daughter (of) Imran who guarded her chastity so We breathed into it of Our Spirit And she believed (in the) Words (of) her Lord and His Books and she was of the devoutly obedient

ayah: وَمَرۡيَمَ ٱبۡنَتَ عِمۡرَٰنَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَحۡصَنَتۡ فَرۡجَهَا فَنَفَخۡنَا فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِنَا وَصَدَّقَتۡ بِكَلِمَٰتِ رَبِّهَا وَكُتُبِهِۦ وَكَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِتِينَ
